thread.title_full: Wonderful Stay - Review of Kerry Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: John L
title: Wonderful Stay
text:
Spent a few nights here while on a China Tour with Viking Cruises. I was not familiar with Kerry or Shangri-la properties, so it was all new to me.
The atmosphere - room, public rooms, employees, the fresh flowers daily, were all first class. The buffet offering for breakfast and dinner were extensive (both western and local foods) and well done.
The room was spacious,clean and modern. Service was prompt and friendly.
All in all, it was a very pleasant experience and I look forward to another stay at another Kerry hotel in the future.
